component_text.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam eget mauris efficitur, consequat tortor id, aliquam tortor. Etiam dolor felis, auctor sed lectus vitae, congue rutrum

bar_mod.comment: Bar length is intentionally displayed inaccurately to emphasise bonuses!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(Value > ValueBase, MinNumericValue(ValuePercent + 0.1, 1), GetIfElse(Value < ValueBase, MinNumericValue(ValuePercentBase + 0.1, 1), ValuePercentBase))

dy_kills.componentleveltooltip: Kills||The number of kills this unit has made in this battle. Kills will count toward a unit's XP.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(IsLargeEntity, GetIfElse(IsCampaign, Loc("large_entity_campaign"), Loc("large_entity")), GetIfElse(IsCampaign, Loc("small_entity_campaign"), Loc("small_entity"))) + " " + Loc("mass") + ': ' + RoundFloat(Mass) + "[[img:ui/skins/default/icon_stat_mass.png]]" + " " + Loc("unit_stat_mass_description")
GetIfElse(IsBattle == false && IsCampaign == false, NumEntitiesInitial, GetIfElse(IsKnownHp, Format("%d (%d)", NumEntities, NumEntitiesInitial), Format("?? (??)")))

(AgentSubtypeAgentPairContext && (PrefAsBool("ui_hero_info_show_battle_stats") == false || (IsContextValid(CharacterContext) && CharacterContext.CanBeEmbedded == false)) && InPendingBattle == false) == false

name_icon_parent.comment: uses ResizeChildrenToFit callback to shrink stat_name (& thus font size) as the mod_icon list grows

callback_with_context.context_function_id: #Needs CcoUnitDetails declared so that the expression is called after the linking of the tooltip parent var# IsShowingExpandedUnitInfo == false
#Needs CcoUnitDetails declared so that the expression is called after the linking of the tooltip parent var# IsShowingExpandedUnitInfo == false

upkeep_cost.componentleveltooltip: Upkeep||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} each turn while this unit exists.

component_text.text: by the end of an Age of Reckoning to add this unit to your Grudge Settler Units panel.
